Description:
Procurement Assistant - Female - IndianBackorder follow-up – Co-ordinate with the principal suppliers on the backorder parts
Compiling & updating the backorder status to the sales & procurement team
Expediting & escalation – converting the orders to a suitable “order type” for expediting the goods
Follow-up & updating ETA in ERP (Oracle) for all shipments
Purchase Order Execution - Processing and confirming the purchase orders for Principal product spare parts
Import Documentation & Logistics - Co-ordination, and follow-up on documents from the Supplier, Freight Forwarder and clearing Agent.
Arrange & coordinate with the Logistics & Freight Forwarder agents for all the shipments from the suppliers
Co-ordination with warehouse & accounting department on payments & commercial documents
PO maintenance in ERP (Oracle)
Other tasks assigned by the Manager/HODSkills
Skills:
Qualification – Bachelor’s Degree
Experience – 3+ years in this position or similar
